title: No In Game sound at all. However league is still on the mixer.
body:
I have a problem where I have 0 in game league sound on any mode, custom etc. There is good sound on my client, and on everything else on my computer. I have checked all in game settings and the software and there is no apparent problem. Only now have I realized how necessary it is to have sound when playing league. 
FYI: Realtek sound system (working well).
I would really appreciate if anyone could help me out on this problem.
Thank you

replies.body: It sounds weird that you'd be able to hear sounds except on league, even though the volume is up on the mixer.  Do you have any programs like Skype running that could potentially mute the game?  You should reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can troubleshoot this with you.  We'll help figure this out!
